title: S16 Ep6: Holzer's Ghosts: They Buried Me Alive - The Haunting of The Morris-Jumel Mansion
itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts: They Buried Me Alive - The Haunting of The Morris-Jumel Mansion
description:
Darkness Radio Presents Holzer's Ghosts: They Buried Me Alive - The Haunting of The Morris-Jumel Mansion

Dave Schrader is joined by special guests Vinny Carbone and Christopher Davalos. Both were featured in the episode of The Holzer Files and have long haunted histories with The Morris-Jumel Mansion.

The team resurrects legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer's case file of the haunted Morris-Jumel Mansion in New York City to investigate a dark, mysterious presence residing within the historic home.

This is one of Dave's favorite episodes of Season 1 for its rich history and the historic sighting of a ghost seen by a group of school children and their teachers, a story that exploded in the papers and drew the attention of Dr. Hans Holzer.

Visit the Morris-Jumel Mansion site here: Paranormal Investigations — Morris-Jumel Mansion

Visit Vinny Carbone's page here: https://bit.ly/39vYnnD
